evaluateVisibilityOnManagedSourceProfileToUpdate

public void evaluateVisibilityOnManagedSourceProfileToUpdate(CustomManagedCategory customManagedCategory,
                                                             PortletService portletService)
Evaluate user visibility on managed source profiles of this managed category And update the customManagedCategory associated with, according to visibilities But there is not any loading of source at this time
